title: mars.radio
text:
mars.radio
 - online classes
 - telepresence


--------------
Online
 - Twitch streams of cool ass shit (to gain interest)
 - Twitter / Instagram sharing more coolness
 $ Coaching
 - Consulting/building installations 

In LA warehouse
 $ Fundraisers (parties)
 $ Workshops / skill-shares
 $ Yoga
 - Screenings (free or donation)
 - Host external meetups (free or donation)
 - Build installations / prototype stuff to take to Mars

$ Workshops
 - Build your own post-corona workstation (how to self-quarantine like a cyberpunk ninja)
 - Vanlife on the information superhighway (how to connect your tiny home to the internet)
 - Rural DIY networking (community internet, mesh networks, decentralization)
 - Reappropriate technology (how to use technology to improve your lifestyle rather than appease your employer)
 - Embedded AI (doing machine learning on cheap microcontrollers)
 - Federated AI (how autonomous communities can collaborate on big data projects whilst ensuring mutual respect)
 - Solar power
 - Transport of the future (electric unicycling)
 - Algorave (live-coding in LA, as a means of exercising your coding skills and making dank beats)
 - Personal fitness (ditch your glitzy gym and get fit on your own terms (maybe we build a bouldering wall in LA too))
 - Personal finance
 - Dronescaping (drone photography and light painting on Mars)
 - Weather stations and other dashboards
 - Virtual worlds (using AR and VR to ready-player-oneify any space)

Tag Cloud
 - Work from home incubator
 - Machine learning and creativity
 - Learn skills to work remote. 
 - Alternative to college
 - Coding Bootcamp
 - Artist Residency
 - Work remote like co-worker camping
 - Sustainable self sufficient
 - Solar
 - Water
 - Internet
 - Food

Analogs
 - Burningman
 - College
 - Incubator
 - Artist Residency
 - Church / Temple / Ashram / Cult

tiers
1) free content
2) interaction (special sessions)
3) coaching (1-on-1 or group)
4) brahman

nanodegrees
 - solar
 - vanlife
 - weather station
 - gig economy
 - AI

Your vanlife:
 - personal living quarters
 - tele-presence studio

expanding honeycomb of hexagons of office trailers. caravans of hexagons 

-------

Portal/workstation

Standing/sitting desk, multiple screens, 

basically phone booth of the 21st century.
take 3d scans of people, and use head tracking, make VR spaces you can inhabit together.
could be conference room with your company, your parents living room, a beach in bali, a solar workshop, a video game, etc etc.
thinking the name of it is Portal.
and that the MCDA (the box she and alsino built) could be the prototype.
maybe it could be one of our camps.
thinking also if and when we have this LA warehouse, we can put a phone booth there too and use it to connect the two locations, and for rapid prototyping/R&D


Or we build portals: flipped trailers cybered out for tele-presence and wfh. Each camp is responsible for advancing something: 1) van infrastructure, energy, water/food, interior, workdesk, internet/networking, telecommuting software, VR

title: Yoga
text:
standing
 - standing breaths
 - surya namaskar (back back + leg stretch) 
 - surya namaskar (chair -> warrior 1 both sides) 
 - vinyasas
 - fingers, palms under heels

asanas
 - L triangle -> side angle -> half moon -> 3 legged dog -> pissing dog, tadasana 
 - R triangle -> side angle -> half moon -> 3 legged dog -> pissing dog, tadasana 
 - chair prayer twist R, L
 - hands behind back, forward bend, and reverse
 - forward bend middle
 - crow
 - R warrior 2 -> warrior 1 -> warrior 3, tadasana
 - L warrior 2 -> warrior 1 -> warrior 3, tadasana
 - R hold toe front, side, and extend
 - L hold toe front, side, and extend
 - L twisted triangle, twisted side angle, twisted half moon, king dancer
 - R twisted triangle, twisted side angle, twisted half moon, king dancer

sitting
 - forward bend, reverse plank, half plank R, half plank L
 - down dog -> pigeon R, down dog -> pigeon L
 - simple twist R, simple twist L
 - abs (boat) + russian twists
 - prayer squat

back
 - R heel up, side, hip twist across
 - L heel up, side, hip twist across
 - sitting knee twist L, R
 - camel | wheel | bow
 - hug knees, massage back, forward bend, plough, shoulder stand, head stand

pranayama x 10 breaths each:

 - breath of fire x 50
 - belly clockwise, counter-clockwise
 - crying + shaking
 - elbows against ribs
 - dancing twists, low, middle, high
 - circles forward, backward

etc

title: Telepresence
text:
**venus security cam**

improve quality
 - stitching
 - focusing
 - pitch, roll, yaw [fisheye projection](https://github.com/hjboisvert/theaterofthemind/blob/0abf9c702c14003a95b25d8c332d050e2053df5f/Docs/fisheye_projection.md)

software
 - vision code
   - https + localhost
   - stitching 
 - performance, framerate
 - [threading](https://github.com/JetsonHacksNano/CSI-Camera/blob/master/dual_camera.py)

hardware
 - camera mount
 - microphone/audio
 - try on raspberry pi

network 
 - wifi connection
 - stop using ngrok
 - self-https

physical
 - making a deployable mount for cameras
 - a body / rover / atv
 - battery pack
 - drone

todo
 - [dronekit](https://dronekit.io/)

Hoverboards
 - [reprogramming hoverboards](https://hackaday.io/project/158256-hoverbot/log/146067-reprogramming-hoverboards-for-robots)
 - [hoverboard firmware hack](https://github.com/NiklasFauth/hoverboard-firmware-hack)
